songs.title: Heartburn
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Love is blind, love is blind
Love is blind, love is blind

[Verse 1: Kevin McCall]
Not too fast, you won't get me again
Now I caught you red handed-d
Thinking you were some super man
Like I'm so stupid, I'm a groupie, I'm a 20 dollar ho

[Pre-Chorus: Kevin McCall]
No, I'm not
Finally adjusting, you now hot
What you to see just what I do, boy, watch
'Cause I'ma get you with your pants down, it's my turn

[Chorus: Chris Brown & Kevin McCall]
I think it's finally your turn to get hurt
So I'm about to burn ya (Yeah)
I can feel it deep inside ya
(Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh)
It's all up in your chest, you got hea-a-a-artburn
Hea-a-a-artburn
You got hea-a-a-artburn
Hea-a-a-artburn
You got hea-a-a-artburn

[Verse 2: Chris Brown]
One foot on the gas, hair in the wind
Come and catch me if you think you can, can
You're a loser, got my bazooka
I know just what it takes to make a man, man, man, man

[Pre-Chorus: Kevin McCall, with Chris Brown]
No, I'm not
Finally adjusting, you now hot
What you to see just what I do, boy, watch
'Cause I'ma get you with your pants down, it's my turn

[Chorus: Chris Brown & Kevin McCall]
I think it's finally your turn to get hurt
So I'm about to burn ya (Yeah)
I can feel it deep inside ya
(Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh)
It's all up in your chest, you got hea-a-a-artburn
Hea-a-a-artburn
You got—
I think it's finally your turn to get hurt
So I'm about to burn ya (Yeah)
I can feel it deep inside ya
(Oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh-oh-oh)
It's all up in your chest, you got hea-a-a-artburn
